caption.p: Antimicrobial activity of natural preparations expressed as Zone of inhibition (mm). ( A) S. pyogenes, ( B) S. flexneri, ( C) S. typhimurium; ( D) H.influenzae;; ( E) P.aeruginosa; ( F) E.coli; ( G) S.aureus; ( H) C.albicans; ( I) C.parapsilopsis (different letters in columns indicate significant differences between values according to the T test, p < 0.05).
